Home » 40P9 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
12 Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika
Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika
56.
146Nasārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  naanārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
147Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  aññamaññe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava.
57.
148Nacittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nanocittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca.)
58.
149Nacetasikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
150Hetuyā nava…pe…  purejāte āsevane pañca…pe…  avigate nava.
59.
151Nacittasampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
152Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  aññamaññe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava.
60.
153Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
154Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  aññamaññe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava.
61.
155Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
156Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  purejāte āsevane pañca…pe…  avigate nava.
62.
157Nocittasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
158Hetuyā nava…pe…  purejāte āsevane pañca…pe…  avigate nava.
63.
159Nocittānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe… . Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
160Hetuyā nava…pe…  purejāte āsevane pañca…pe…  avigate nava.
64.
161Naajjhattikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nabāhiraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
162Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  avigate nava.
65.
163Naupādā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
164Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  purejāte āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca.
66.
165Naupādinnaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
166Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ…pe…  āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca.
